title: Global industrial robot market : key companies by related revenue 2017
yAxis: Industrial robot revenue in million euros
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories for the x axis representing Companies, and a y axis representing Industrial robot revenue in million euros.
The highest category is found at ABB where Industrial robot revenue in million euros is 6819.0.
The lowest category is found at KUKA where Industrial robot revenue in million euros is 1200.0.
